channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@YehudahMirsky Maybe the Biden Administration should demand Israel stop funding hostile forces. https://t.co/H65LImoRgp
@YehudahMirsky Yes, I know AIPAC isn’t controlled by GOI. Heck, I bet most AIPAC leaders don’t respect the legitimacy of the Bennett government….
@bruces DALL-E, show me the Penny Black cinematic universe.
Happy second day Yom Yerushalaim to all my fellow Diaspora Jews. https://t.co/rHWZcLPI3T

@JewJewBear86 @JewWhoHasItAll @DavidFeuer @RauvanM Maybe. But I love the mid-20th century classics best. Shavuot From The Heart is my guilty Dylan pleasure.
@JewJewBear86 @JewWhoHasItAll @DavidFeuer @RauvanM The first time you hear those crazy accordions on Shibolet Basedeh you go huh? but put it on repeat and you’ll understand.
@trekonomics The only thing better is when he starts blowing your mind. It won’t be long now.
@brianbeutler I’m taking all of these pronouncements as efforts at inspiring stochastic terrorism.

@trekonomics Absolutely mind blowing. Saw it in its original run with minimal expectations.
@trekonomics A couple great years for Philip Glass soundtracks. Cf. Ran.
@HeerJeet Time to reread American Pastoral in light of this information.
@PFLerner @Jacob_Labendz @melnickjeffrey1 Up in Rochester golus, we needed a second freezer in the garage to handle the bulk deliveries of kosher meat imported from downstate.

People complain about using American racial issues for understanding Israel/Palestine. But I’ve found that understanding the Israeli arena very useful for understanding American policing. https://t.co/z0t0P4YxLE
@rmneiss What would it mean to treat communities members and politicians who oppose gun control the same as we do those who support BDS?

“But this is Ari’s trophy. He thinks the rest of the guys are envious. When the truth is the rest of his cabal are so narcissistic they don’t care who Ari is married to, they just care about themselves. So the joke is on Ari.” https://t.co/CVRLNLFuMA

@cakesandcourage How many cars did they license in all? Did they ever have to spring for four digits?
@cakesandcourage My grandfather told me the first car he remembered seeing was in the Atlanta WWI Victory Parade.
@trekonomics I don’t know with you. You complain that Vichy gave in too soon, and here these spammers are persistent and still you kvetch.
@ShulimLeifer @EvelKneidel @doctorscience @yaffedorg @Yakovolf @OJPAC @NYSEDNews @errollouis Here’s my report of some frum reactions to Obama’s election. https://t.co/Vrd8dG5kXR

@BunnyAdvocate @dman4835 @AkivaMCohen @TwitterSafety Separately: Everything about American constitutional jurisprudence is up for grabs. The Court had announced that precedents are no longer binding. That means everything.
@BunnyAdvocate @dman4835 @AkivaMCohen @TwitterSafety I expect this to be reflected in dramatically rising costs of libel insurance, certainly in Fifth Circuit states.
Some old time religion, American-style https://t.co/9I5YqKGF9x

@AShihipar In unity is strength. Like a bundle of sticks is so much more powerful than any one stick.
@AShihipar Does she think this will save her from Gitmo when the show trials begin?
@Mad_Science_Guy @ZachWeiner Even if the equations are the same, the value of the variables have not.
@shaynamalka @LahavHarkov Is aluminum a required ingredient, or will they work in a glass pan of that size?
@Tzipshmil @owillis The Hindenburg Democrats. Who are objectively better than the Vichy Democrats we’ll be “voting” for in 2028.
